HomePage.title: GANDHADAGUDI GARDEN BYAHATTI
HomePage.description: Welcome to Gandhadagudi Garden Byahatti, your ultimate destination for a perfect getaway amidst nature. Nestled in the heart of Byahatti, we offer a one of a kind experience with our exclusive Gandhadagudi Garden and custom made Packages to suit every traveller. Whether you're seeking adventure at our Byahatti Gandhadagudi Garden, or relaxation at our Swimming Pool Resort, Gandhadagudi luxury garden has it all.
HomePage.treeHouseDescription: Can enjoy views at Tree houses.
HomePage.wifiDescription: Stay connected with complimentary high-speed internet.
HomePage.restuarantDescription: Enjoy delicious meals at the restuarant.
HomePage.lawnGardenDescription: A lawn garden is a green space often used for relaxation.
HomePage.partyHallDescription: A party hall is a spacious venue for celebrations.
HomePage.swimmingPoolDescription: Relax and rejuvenate in our serene swimming pool.
HomePage.gandhadagudiGardenActivities: GANDHADAGUDI GARDEN ACTIVITIES: ADVENTURE, RELAXATION & MORE
HomePage.siddharodaMathaDescription: Siddharoodha Matha in Hubli located just 20kms away is a revered spiritual center dedicated to the teachings of Shri Siddharoodha Swami, attracting devotees from across India.
HomePage.moorSavirMathaDescription: Moorusavira Matha in Hubli located just 18kms away is a historic 12th-century Lingayat monastery, named after the arrival of 3,000 Shivasharanas led by Channabasaveshwara, and is renowned for its spiritual heritage and community service.
HomePage.chandraMouleshwarTempleDescription: The Chandramouleshwara Temple in Unkal, Hubli, located just 18kms away is a 900-year-old Chalukyan-era shrine dedicated to Lord Shiva, renowned for its unique four-faced linga and exquisite carvings that reflect a blend of Shaivism, Vaishnavism, and Shaktism traditions.
HomePage.tolanakereLakeDescription: Tolankere Lake in Hubli is a rejuvenated urban oasis featuring walking paths, an open gym, children's play areas, and a serene lake, making it a popular spot for fitness enthusiasts and families alike.
HomePage.unakalLakeDescription: Unkal Lake in Hubli located just 21kms away is a 200-acre man-made reservoir built in the 11th century during the Chalukya dynasty, serving as a major water source and a scenic spot for recreation and boating.
HomePage.nrupatungaHillDescription: Nrupatunga Hill, also known as Nrupatunga Betta located just 13kms away, is a serene hillock in Hubli offering panoramic views of the twin cities, a children's park, and a tranquil environment ideal for morning walks and picnics.
HomePage.gandhadagudiGardenDistanceFromProminentP: Gandhadagudi Garden distance from Prominent places
HomePage.bookResortDescription: For those looking for value, we offer the cheapest Packages without compromising on quality. Immerse yourself in the natural beauty and comfort that only GandhadaGudi Garden can provide.
HomePage.gandhadagudiGardenByahattiDescription: Gandhadagudi Garden Byahatti, your ultimate destination for a perfect getaway amidst nature.
HomePage.sunilTalwar: Every moment was delightful! The boat ride was thrilling and the staff were very supportive.
HomePage.udayKodabali: A perfect getaway from the city chaos. The lush greenery and calm surroundings refreshed our spirits.
HomePage.ranjitAlagawadi: The rope climbing and adventure park were so much fun! A great place for both kids and adults.
HomePage.abhishekShiratti: The hotel is well located, rooms were clean and the staff was friendly. Loved the spa services!
HomePage.shivarajPatil: All the rooms were beautifully renovated. The staff helped us plan our itinerary and made the trip memorable.
HomePage.malathiP: A peaceful place with wonderful staff. Loved the ambiance and the food. Definitely coming back!
HomePage.praveenKumar: Serene surroundings, courteous staff, and a delicious buffet spread. Great hospitality!
HomePage.lalithaPawar: We spent a joyful weekend surrounded by nature. Clean rooms, great food, and attentive service.
HomePage.kaveriHulkoti: From kayaking to exploring gardens, everything was perfect. A great spot for family time.
HomePage.maheshKumbar: Clean property, helpful staff, and the rain dance area was a big hit with our group!
